duration of one jumping phase while there is no floor contact. Instruction: "Please jump."

the emphasis of one movement against another one, e.g. with usage of extreme movement qualities (strong effort, whole body involvement, particularly narrow or wide kinesphere, particularly deep or high level,..) while contracting and expanding. Instruction: " Contract and expand several times."

the relation between the focal point and the fulcrum of the body. Instruction: "Please stop and elevate on the balls of your feet and try to stand there....Now try to stay on the ball of one foot and move the other leg away from the floor."
